ARABIC: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they are asked, 'What has your Lord sent down?' they say, 'Myths and legends of previous peoples.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For when they are asked: "What has your Lord sent down?" they say: "Tales of long ago."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When they are asked: "What is it that your Lord has revealed?" They answer: "They are merely tales of olden times!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they are asked, "What has your Lord revealed to you?" they say, "Only ancient legends".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when it is said to them, “What has your Lord sent down?”, they say, “The tales of former people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when it is said to them: "What is it that your Lord has revealed" They say: "Tales of the men of old!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when it is said to them, what is it that your Lord has revealed? They say: Stories of the ancients;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when it is said to them, 'What has your Lord sent down?' they say, 'Fairy-tales of the ancients.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when it is said unto them: What hath your Lord revealed? they say: (Mere) fables of the men of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they are asked, "What is it that your Lord has sent down?" they say, "Stories of the ancients."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when it is said unto them: what is it that your Lord hath sent down? they say: fables of the ancient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they are asked, ‘What is it that your Lord has sent down?’ They say, ‘Myths of the ancients,’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When it is said to them, "What is it that your Lord has revealed?" they say, "Tales of the ancients!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when it is said to them: "What is it that your Lord has sent down (unto Muhammad SAW)?" They say: "Tales of the men of old!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And if they are asked: 'What has your Lord revealed' they say: 'Tales of the ancients, fairytales'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when it is said to them, “What has your Lord sent down?” They say, “Legends of the ancients.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:24] The following was revealed regarding al-Nadr b. al-Hārith: And when it is said to them, ‘What is it (mā is an interrogative particle; dhā is a relative particle) that your Lord has revealed?’, to Muhammad (s), they say, [that] these [revelations] are, ‘fables, lies, of the ancients’, in order to lead people astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 284 (And when it is said unto them) to those who were later killed in the valley of Badr: (What hath your Lord revealed?) What does Muhammad (pbuh) say to you on behalf of your Lord? (they say: (Mere) fables of the men of old) the mere lies and tales of the people of old.
